attributes.action: nationalise theJazz radio station to prevent it going off the air in March 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The commercial media company GCap is set to close down award-winning theJazz radio station with around 400,000 listeners - after just over a year of broadcasting. This will leave the UK once again without a dedicated jazz station. The government is wasting billions of our money on Norther Rock. Why can't they save something useful?
